front.title: List Pagination Snapshots for YANG-driven Protocols

abstract.t: List pagination for YANG-driven protocols are defined in [I-D.ietf-netconf-list-pagination]. Operational data can have very large data sets. These data sets can furthermore have big churn, a lot of additions or deletions to the data set. In order to support a stable pagination of such data sets, snapshots can be used. This document defines snapshot support for pagination of "config false" nodes of type "list" and "leaf-list". The snapshot support for individual nodes is signaled via the "ietf-system-capabilities" module.
